learn.heading: A Proper Introduction to the Market
learn.text: We are here to walk you through everything from index funds to the mindset needed to be a successful investor.

discover.heading: Pinpoint the Best Index Funds and ETFs
discover.text: Learn how to read a balance sheet, analyze volatility, and see through the fluff.

watch.heading: Keep An Eye On Your Favorites
watch.text: Save your favorite stocks and ETFs to view at a glance.
